org.modelio.vcore.smkernel

Class SmStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.SmStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPStatus, IRStatus

    public final class SmStatus
extends Object
implements IRStatus, IPStatus
    Bit flags for SmObject runtime and permanent status.

    The status is decomposed in 2 32 bits parts : runtime status (lower bits) and persistent status (high bits).

    Each status part is decomposed in 2 layers: a flags layer and a definition layer. Each flag as another flag that tells if the flag is defined on this status. If not, the reader has to look for the composition owner status.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long MASK_NEVER_UNDEFINED
      Flags that must never be undefined in order for Modelio to work.

    • Method Detail

      • areAllSet

        public static StatusState areAllSet(long status,
                                    long bitdef)
        Tells whether all the given flags are set in this status. Returns:
        • StatusState.UNDEFINED if any of the flags is not defined,
        • StatusState.TRUE if all of them are defined and set to StatusState.TRUE,
        • StatusState.FALSE if all of them are defined and some are set to StatusState.FALSE.
        Parameters:
        status - the status to test
        bitdef - the flags to test
        Returns:
        StatusState.UNDEFINED if any of the flags is not defined, StatusState.TRUE if all of them are defined and set, else StatusState.FALSE.

      • flagsToString

        public static String flagsToString(long bitdef)
        Return the string representation of the given flags combination. Flags are to be found in IRStatus and IPStatus.
        Parameters:
        bitdef - a combination of lags, not a status.
        Returns:
        the string representation.

      • getBits

        public static long getBits(long status,
                           long bitdef)
        Get the value and mask bits filtered by the given access mask.
        Parameters:
        status - a status
        bitdef - an access mask
        Returns:
        the value and mask bits

      • getFalseFlags

        public static long getFalseFlags(long status)
        Get flags defined to FALSE in the given status
        Parameters:
        status - a status
        Returns:
        the flags defined to FALSE.

      • getPersistentBits

        public static long getPersistentBits(long status)
        Get the persistent value and mask bits.
        Parameters:
        status - a status
        Returns:
        the persistent value and mask bits.

      • isAnySet

        public static StatusState isAnySet(long status,
                                   long bitdef)
        Tells whether any of the given flags is set to TRUE.
        • StatusState.TRUE if any of them are defined and set to StatusState.TRUE,
        • StatusState.UNDEFINED if no flag is TRUE and at least one flag is UNDEFINED,
        • StatusState.FALSE if all of them are defined to StatusState.FALSE.
        Parameters:
        status - a status
        bitdef - the flags to test
        Returns:
        the test result.

      • isComplete

        public static boolean isComplete(long status)
        Test whether all bit masks are set.
        Parameters:
        status - the status to test.
        Returns:
        true if all flags are defined, false if some flags need to be read on another status

      • setNotFalseFlags

        public static long setNotFalseFlags(long astatus,
                                    long trueFlags,
                                    long falseFlags,
                                    long undefFlags)
        Set the given flags state, except FALSE flags are left untouched.

        Use the constants defined in IRStatus and IPStatus. No delete flag must be undefined, in the other case Modelio behavior is undefined.

        Parameters:
        astatus - the initial status
        trueFlags - a combination of flags to set.
        falseFlags - a combination of flags to unset.
        undefFlags - a combination of flags to undefine.
        Returns:
        the modified status

      • setFlags

        public static long setFlags(long origStatus,
                            long bitdef,
                            StatusState state)
        Set the state of the given flags.

        No delete flag must be undefined, in the other case Modelio behavior is undefined.

        Parameters:
        origStatus - the original status value.
        bitdef - the flags to modify.
        state - the new state of the flags
        Returns:
        the modified status

      • setFlags

        public static long setFlags(long astatus,
                            long trueFlags,
                            long falseFlags,
                            long undefFlags)
        Set the given flags state.

        Use the constants defined in IRStatus and IPStatus. No delete flag must be undefined, in the other case Modelio behavior is undefined.

        Parameters:
        astatus - the initial status
        trueFlags - a combination of flags to set.
        falseFlags - a combination of flags to unset.
        undefFlags - a combination of flags to undefine.
        Returns:
        the modified status

        public static String toString(long status)
        Return a string representation of the given status flags.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
